}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''ASUS WL-107''' is based on [[Ralink]] RT2400 802.11b wireless chipset.
The ASUS WL-107 Cardbus Card driver for Win98SE/WinME/Win2K/WinXP.
*[http://wireless-drivers.blogspot.com/2011/12/asus-wl-107-wireless-80211b-cardbus.html ''ASUS WL-107 - Wireless 802.11b Cardbus Adapter''] :PCI\VEN_1814&DEV_0101&SUBSYS_01071043 :PCI\VEN_1814&DEV_0101&SUBSYS_01251043 :PCI\VEN_1814&DEV_0101&SUBSYS_01261043 :PCI\VEN_1814&DEV_0101&SUBSYS_01271043
